title: What is the difference between real 3D and digital 3D? - Quora

response.answer_text: This is the best answer I’ve found: Differences Between Real 3D & Digital 3D | eHow Excerpt: 3-D technology used in movie theaters include Imax, RealD 3D and Dolby Digital 3D….Imax is primarily based on film technology, while RealD 3D and Dolby Digital 3D are both digital 3-D formats. In the case of RealD 3D and Dolby Digital 3D, their differences are more technical than visual in nature. The article goes into further details on the points of 3-glasses design, movie screen requirements, and projectors for each 3-d technology type.
